name: aet-calc
description: A browser-based heart rate drift calculator to help you determine your Aerobic Threshold (AeT), following the Uphill Athlete methodology.

scripts.build: cp src/index.html dist/ && browserify src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js -p esmify -v
scripts.watch: watchify src/main.js -o src/bundle.js -p esmify -v & reload -b -d src/

author: Douglas Watson
